title: School Simplified
content: School Simplified is a non-profit organization dedicated to the development and improvement of students ranging from ages 13+

title: Sparks Volleyball Club
content: Sparks volleyball is a club based in las vegas that provide a fun and competitive volleyball experience for kids of all gender and ages

title: Programming Simplified
content: Programming Simplified is a non-profit organization with the mission to help as many kids as possible learn the tools to become software engineers.

title: Take The Throne
content: Take the throne is a 30 player battle royale with the aim is to hit your enemies off platforms to become king and win.

title: Tic Tac Toe Multiplayer
content: Play tic tac toe multiplayer online with your friends in realtime using socket io on the server and the frontend, and change colors by going into your settings
